message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $9000. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. Let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $9000 is a bit more than I'd like to spend right now. How about $8500?  Let me know if that works for you.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $8500. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm counteroffering at $8750. Let me know if that works for you!
